languages.text: "Поразительно, сколь убоги и прозрачны могут быть интриги этой низшей расы. Но меня утомили {mf|его|ее} сказки, я желаю отведать {mf|его|ее} страданий".

traits.locale_text: "Поразительно, сколь убоги и прозрачны могут быть интриги этой низшей расы. Но меня утомили {mf|его|ее} сказки, я желаю отведать {mf|его|ее} страданий".
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "It fascinates me how pathetic and transparent the intrigue of their lesser kind can be. However, I have grown weary of this one's tales. I wish to taste {mf|his|her} anguish."
languages.original_text: "Поразительно, сколь убоги и прозрачны могут быть интриги этой низшей расы. Но меня утомили {mf|его|ее} сказки, я желаю отведать {mf|его|ее} страданий".

languages.text: « C'est fascinant de voir à quel point les intrigues sont pathétiques et transparentes chez ces êtres inférieurs. Mais je suis las des palabres de {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci}. Je veux goûter à son angoisse. »
languages.original_text: "It fascinates me how pathetic and transparent the intrigue of their lesser kind can be. However, I have grown weary of this one's tales. I wish to taste {mf|his|her} anguish."

traits.locale_text: « C'est fascinant de voir à quel point les intrigues sont pathétiques et transparentes chez ces êtres inférieurs. Mais je suis las des palabres de {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci}. Je veux goûter à son angoisse. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: “这种低级种族的谎言实在是太单薄、太可悲了，真让人觉得有趣。不过，我对这只猴子的故事已经没兴趣了，我想品尝一下{mf|他|她}的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "It fascinates me how pathetic and transparent the intrigue of their lesser kind can be. However, I have grown weary of this one's tales. I wish to taste {mf|his|her} anguish."

traits.locale_text: “这种低级种族的谎言实在是太单薄、太可悲了，真让人觉得有趣。不过，我对这只猴子的故事已经没兴趣了，我想品尝一下{mf|他|她}的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: 「劣等種の企てる陰謀とは、実に哀れで見え透いていて、楽しいものだな。だが俺はこいつの与太話にはいい加減飽き飽きした。そろそろこいつの苦悩を味わいたい」
languages.original_text: "It fascinates me how pathetic and transparent the intrigue of their lesser kind can be. However, I have grown weary of this one's tales. I wish to taste {mf|his|her} anguish."

traits.locale_text: 「劣等種の企てる陰謀とは、実に哀れで見え透いていて、楽しいものだな。だが俺はこいつの与太話にはいい加減飽き飽きした。そろそろこいつの苦悩を味わいたい」
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "Es fasziniert mich, wie jämmerlich und durchschaubar die Intrigen dieser niederen Art sind. Aber ich habe{mf|seine|ihre} Geschichten so satt. Ich will lieber {mf|seinen|ihren} Schmerz auskosten."
languages.original_text: "It fascinates me how pathetic and transparent the intrigue of their lesser kind can be. However, I have grown weary of this one's tales. I wish to taste {mf|his|her} anguish."

traits.locale_text: "Es fasziniert mich, wie jämmerlich und durchschaubar die Intrigen dieser niederen Art sind. Aber ich habe{mf|seine|ihre} Geschichten so satt. Ich will lieber {mf|seinen|ihren} Schmerz auskosten."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: «Me fascina lo patéticas y transparentes que pueden llegar a ser las intrigas de esta especie inferior. Pero ya me he cansado de los cuentos de {mf|este|esta}. Deseo saborear su agonía».
languages.original_text: "It fascinates me how pathetic and transparent the intrigue of their lesser kind can be. However, I have grown weary of this one's tales. I wish to taste {mf|his|her} anguish."

traits.locale_text: «Me fascina lo patéticas y transparentes que pueden llegar a ser las intrigas de esta especie inferior. Pero ya me he cansado de los cuentos de {mf|este|esta}. Deseo saborear su agonía».
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "Şu âciz ırkların entrikalarının böylesine zavallı ve bariz olmasına hayranım. Yine de şunun mavallarından gına geldi. Artık çekeceği ızdırabı tatmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "It fascinates me how pathetic and transparent the intrigue of their lesser kind can be. However, I have grown weary of this one's tales. I wish to taste {mf|his|her} anguish."

traits.locale_text: "Şu âciz ırkların entrikalarının böylesine zavallı ve bariz olması, beni hayran bırakıyor. Yine de şunun mavallarından gına geldi. Artık çekeceği ızdırabı tatmak istiyorum."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM
